item.title: Need help quick, thanks!
item.dc:creator: @newman0071 newman0071
item.description:
@newman0071 wrote:

Mhh heres mine. change the item to spawn or item if you would like.

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick, thanks!
item.dc:creator: @Inception-X Inception-X
item.description:
@Inception-X wrote:

i need help making the spawning command admin+ this will be very appreciated. THANKYOU!

This is what i got…

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("item")) { if (cmd.length < 2) { if (player.getRights() <= 3) player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "Use: ;;item id (optional:amount)"); return true; } int itemId = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]).intValue(); try { player.getInventory().addItem( itemId, cmd.length >= 3 ? Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]).intValue() : 1); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "Use: ;;item id (optional:amount)"); } return true; }
